text.p: Fiserv Inc said Friday it completed its acquisition of BHC Financial Inc, exchanging 0.87446 share of Fiserv for every BHC share.
Fiserv said the final exchange ratio was determined with the average Fiserv closing price from April 30 to May 28. The transaction will be accounted for as a pooling of interests.
In March Fiserv said it agreed to acquire BHC for $33.50 a share.
BHC is based in Philadelphia and provides securities processing and support services.
Fiserv provides financial data processing systems and related information management services and products.
